name: Mission EOS
description:
In this game, you will be challenged to build up the foundation for the first human colony on Mars. You will achieve this by assembling your rovers out of a pool of different modules. Then you will program them and watch them gather resources, build new infrastructure and drive around the surface.

This game has been created by:
- Jan Gihr                          | Lead Developer & Project Manager
- Markus Werner         | Vision Keeper & Game Designer
- Philipp Wachsmuth | UI Designer/Developer
- Hoang Vu Nguyen    | 3D Artist & Rover Engineer
- Deniz Toprak               | Developer & Pipeline Engineer

over the course of 4 months as a semester project at the university of applied science Darmstadt.
